overview: Murder is always an ugly business, and even more so when the victim was a beautiful woman… With Australia as the backdrop, detective Ferenz tries to ascertain the motive for this terrible crime. Along the way discovering the true personality of the victim’s disconsolate husband, a businessman with deviant sexual predilections, and getting to know an ardent policewoman, the queen of fetishism and the kinky world of latex… A thriller brim full of intrigue and unrestrained sexual action.
title: Rubber Kiss
